europeana:record.dc:title: Monografien Entomologie Neuroptera MEN2 (1986)
europeana:record.dc:creator: Adams P. A., Anonymus , Aspöck Horst, Aspöck Ulrike, Canard Michel, Duelli Peter, Gepp Johannes, Hölzel Herbert, Kokubu H., Mansell Mervyn W., Meinander Martin, Monserrat Victor J., New Timothy R., Paulus Hannes F., Penny Norman D., Popov Alexi, Sagne Jean Claude, Schlüter Thomas, Tröger Ernst Joachim
europeana:record.dc:description: Inhaltsverzeichnis: Johannes Gepp, Horst Aspöck, Herbert Hölzel: Foreword - Vorwort. 9- 10. Anonymus: 2nd International Symposium on Neuropterology in Hamburg. 11- 14. Horst Aspöck: The Raphidioptera of the World: A Review of Present Knowledge. 15- 29. Martin Meinander: The Coniopterygidae of America (Neuroptera). 31- 43. Mervyn W. Mansell: Neuropterology in Southern Africa. 45- 52. Herbert Hölzel: Biogeography of Palaearctic Myrmeleonidae (Neuropteroidea: Planipennia). 53- 70. Timothy R. New: Distribution of the Australian Myrmeleontidae (Insecta, Neuroptera). 71- 76. Mervyn W. Mansell: Biogeography and Phylogeny of the Crocinae (Neuroptera: Nemopteridae). 77- 85. Ulrike Aspöck: The Present State of Knowledge on the Family Berothidae (Neuropteroidea: Planipennia). 87- 101. Thomas Schlüter: The Fossil Planipennia - a Review. 103- 111. Alexi Popov: Die Hemerobiiden der Mongolei (Neuropteroidea: Planipennia). 113- 117. P. A. Adams, Norman D. Penny: Faunal Relations of Amazonian Chrysopidae. 119- 124. Timothy R. New: A Preliminary Comparison of the Neuroptera of Australia and New Guinea. 125- 130. Ernst Joachim Tröger: Neuere Untersuchungen zur Neuropteren-Fauna in Südwestdeutschland. 131- 136. Johannes Gepp: Biology and Larval Diagnosis of Central European Neuroptera (A Review of Present Knowledge). 137- 144. Michel Canard: A Cautious Univoltine Strategy in the Lacewing Nineta flava (Scopoli) (Neuroptera, Chrysopidae). 145- 150. H. Kokubu, Peter Duelli: Adult Food of Osmylidae: Intestinal Contents of Osmylus fulvicephalus (SCOPOLI). 151- 155. Hannes F. Paulus: Comparative Morphology of the Larval Eyes of Neuropteroidea. 157- 164. Peter Duelli: Flight Activity Patterns in Lacewings (Planipennia : Chrysopidae). 165- 170. Jean Claude Sagne: Carbohydrate Content Variations in Chrysopa walkeri McLachlan (Neuroptera, Chrysopidae) during Its Prepupal Diapause. 171- 172. Victor J. Monserrat: Longinos Navâs, His Neuropterologica] Work and Collection. 173- 176
